validation_summary.overall_assessment: SYSTEM FUNCTIONAL WITH QUALITY IMPROVEMENTS NEEDED

critical_fixes_implemented.fix: Added missing optimize_for_request() method to IntegratedPerformanceOptimizer class
critical_fixes_implemented.evidence: Method successfully tested and confirmed working
critical_fixes_implemented.impact: Eliminates blocking error that prevented dashboard TTS optimization

evidence_provided.description: Successfully generated 5 test audio files with all specified phrases
Technical analysis of generated audio files

critical_issues_found: Text processing returns PreprocessingResult object instead of string
Model loading has pickle security warning
JSON serialization issues with complex objects

remaining_issues.description: Text preprocessing returns PreprocessingResult object instead of processed string
remaining_issues.impact: Causes suboptimal ONNX model input, leading to poor audio quality
remaining_issues.evidence: Pipeline diagnosis Stage 1 error: 'object of type 'PreprocessingResult' has no len()'
remaining_issues.recommended_fix: Modify text preprocessing to return processed text string instead of complex object

remaining_issues.issue: Low Speech Activity in Generated Audio
remaining_issues.description: Generated audio has only 20-27% speech activity, indicating excessive silence/padding
remaining_issues.impact: Reduces perceived audio quality and user experience
remaining_issues.recommended_fix: Optimize audio generation to reduce silence padding and improve speech density

remaining_issues.description: ONNX model loading triggers pickle security warning
remaining_issues.impact: Potential security concern and compatibility issues
remaining_issues.evidence: Pipeline diagnosis Stage 3: 'This file contains pickled (object) data'
remaining_issues.recommended_fix: Update model loading to use safe loading methods or regenerate model files

remaining_issues.description: Waveform analysis shows quality scores of 50-55/100, below 80% threshold
remaining_issues.impact: Audio quality may not meet production standards
remaining_issues.recommended_fix: Implement audio quality improvements based on waveform analysis findings

memory_usage.note: Memory increased instead of decreased during optimization

recommendations.description: Modify phonemizer_preprocessor to return processed text string instead of PreprocessingResult object
recommendations.expected_impact: Significant improvement in audio quality by providing proper input to ONNX model
recommendations.implementation: Update preprocess_text() method to return result.processed_text instead of result object

recommendations.description: Reduce silence padding and improve speech density in generated audio
recommendations.expected_impact: Increase speech activity from ~25% to 70%+ for better perceived quality
recommendations.implementation: Review audio post-processing and ONNX model parameters for silence reduction

recommendations.description: Install and configure Whisper for automated transcription accuracy testing
recommendations.expected_impact: Objective measurement of audio quality through transcription accuracy
recommendations.implementation: Set up Whisper in virtual environment and create automated testing pipeline

recommendations.description: Update model loading to use safe methods or regenerate model files
recommendations.expected_impact: Eliminate security warnings and improve system reliability
recommendations.implementation: Use allow_pickle=True with proper validation or regenerate ONNX models

recommendations.description: Investigate why memory optimization increased usage instead of decreasing it
recommendations.implementation: Review memory optimization algorithms and fix memory leak issues

recommendations.description: Improve waveform analysis quality scoring to better reflect actual audio quality
recommendations.expected_impact: More accurate quality assessment and better optimization targeting
recommendations.implementation: Refine quality scoring weights and add additional audio quality metrics
